data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 33,521 believers in Razavi Khorasan, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Razavi Khorasan, Iran
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Razavi Khorasan, Iran that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Razavi Khorasan, Iran to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Razavi Khorasan against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Hazara people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Hazara people know you.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Razavi Khorasan, Iran.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Razavi Khorasan that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Razavi Khorasan, Iran has a population of 6,434,500.

We estimate Razavi Khorasan has 33,521 people who might know Jesus, 86,890 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,314,089 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 6,400,979 people in Razavi Khorasan who are far from you. Please add 1,286 new house churches this year.
